title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Safe Families for Children in Jan 2014
Interview Descriptions: Very relaxed.  As long as you can pass a background check and are willing to help, the company is willing to give you a chance.The organization is in need of as much help as it can get because the need seems to be unquenchable.
Interview Questions: If you could solve a world problem what would you do and how would you do it?
